Text: thanks, been waiting all week for this, it's getting good. I am from the Uk and love being able to watch it a week before everyone else, this way i can spoil it for everybody else. HAHA XD

going wonky trying to figure out whom the big bads are! Has to be bloody aliens to be able to mess about with morphic fields and so forth, but wondering if RTD is going to use a past adversary from earlier Torchwood or Doctor Who, or if it's some new race. Brilliant! thank you for this my Lord Whale.
